"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock anthem embodies the spirit of perseverance and determination, symbolizing the resilience and grit required to overcome obstacles.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem celebrates the strength and confidence that comes from facing challenges head-on and rising above them.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This timeless hit represents the unwavering belief in oneself and one's abilities, even in the face of adversity.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational rap song embodies the drive and determination required to push through obstacles and achieve success.
"We Are the Champions" by Queen - This iconic anthem celebrates the triumph and victory that comes from overcoming challenges and achieving greatness.
